title: Create the League of Legends version of the Ginyu Force
body:
Who would you chose? Remember that it does not have to conform to the meta in any way, pick any five.

We need to give them some sort of ridiculous crime fighting/vigilante team skin.

replies.body:
Muay Thai Lee Sin, Definately Not Udyr, Syndra (in their Recall animations). That's three...

I'm kinda conflicted over over who Guldo would be. Either Omega Squad Teemo (in passive stance), or Kennen...

And Jeice, I got nothin'. It's hard to find a pose that matches his off the top of my head.

But I would definitely call them the Goon Squad. There's no doubt in my mind about that...


Or maybe The Goon Force?

... maybe not.
